mapper.select: SELECT p.`name` as productName, r.number_times, ifnull(useNumber,0) as useNumber, DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 1 DAY) as expirationDateTime FROM refueling_kit r LEFT JOIN product p on p.id = r.product_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(1) as useNumber,kit_id FROM use_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} and use_type = 3 GROUP BY kit_id) k on k.kit_id = r.id where r.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT id FROM refueling_kit r left join (SELECT count(1) number,kit_id FROM use_log where state = 0 and user_id = #{userId} and use_type = 3 group by kit_id) u on u.kit_id = r.id WHERE DATE_ADD(create_time, INTERVAL 1 DAY) >= now() and user_id = #{userId} and number_times > u.number and r.deleted = 0 ORDER BY id limit 1
